title: Music
summary: Enjoy your music collection with great sound and ultra-long playback!
description: The Music application from Sony gives you a wonderful experience when listening to your music files. Import your music, arrange in playlists and just listen away. We optimize the sound to make it sound great and make sure little power is used, so you can listen for as long as you want. If you have an Android Wear device, you can control your music and transfer your favorite playlists and listen with just a Bluetooth headset connected.The Music application is only compatible with Xperia devices.
descriptionHTML:
The Music application from Sony gives you a wonderful experience when listening to your music files. Import your music, arrange in playlists and just listen away. We optimize the sound to make it sound great and make sure little power is used, so you can listen for as long as you want.

If you have an Android Wear device, you can control your music and transfer your favorite playlists and listen with just a Bluetooth headset connected.

The Music application is only compatible with Xperia devices.
comments: Best optimized, need some fixes like eliminating or un allow the duplicate files on the Playlist. Some songs are repeating on long play queue.

The music app is awesome and absolutely non comparable to any other music player... But the most important thing I wanna ask that can I save the music data permanently which I download....üòÖüòÖüòÖ........

Couldn't run along browser these days recently which made the device hot, and restart a few times. As much as I believe that this wasn't the case before updates of the browser, this side should know a little bit of the details.
The latest version is much lagging in performance and we get those underlines for the fonts in home section. Hope SONY will fix it ASAP with another update. ‚úåüèª

Everything is great except for one thing,everytime i edit the music info of my songs (name of the song,artist,album cover,etc) after a restart or just playing bunch of songs,the info gets reset to the way it used to be.
The latest update does not adapt the color of the Music Player in the notification shade to the color of the album art on devices running Android Oreo
recentChanges: - Added album art in songs lists
- Display disc number in album view if available

Contacts permission is needed for us to access your Google Drive account if you use that feature. We will not use it to access your contacts info and if you do not use Google Drive feature, we will not use this permission.
